data.name: HMM Founder's Pack - Bronze Edition
data.detailed_description:
In the Bronze Founder’s pack, you will receive all current characters plus the ones we release until the end of the beta and they will all come with the Metal Legend skin -
this will not bleed into any new characters that are released after the game officially launches.

Players will also receive the digital soundtrack as well as a personalized avatar border in game.

To sum it up, this pack includes:
  • All current characters plus all the ones we release during the beta.
  • A Metal Legend skin for all characters we release during the beta - Including current ones.
  • Personalized avatar border to set you apart.
  • Digital Heavy Metal Machines soundtrack.

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 4000 or Nvidia GT 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
